name: Attack of the Changelings
description:
Note: EXE  VERSION RECOMMENDED.
Use a bow & arrow to reduce the numbers of murderous shapeshifting creatures, whilst platforming to safety.

Expect game play mechanics such as blast jumping and moving platforms.

Submission for the Godot Firejam. Pretty much all the models and animations for those models were made in the alotted time frame as well as most of the code (although some minor elements were copied and pasted from other projects, such as certain GUI elements).

Unfortunately it turned out a little unstable, and it may crash on rare occasions due to an annoyingly obscure physics collision bug if the exe is used.  Nevertheless I would recommend the exe for the best experience, as this crash is fairly rare.

While HTML on the other hand appears to be stable, having not crashed once in my experience with it, I would still not recommend it, as it has not been optimised for it, being choppy and borderline unplayable on the larger levels, with the final level being next to impossible as a consequence.

As a side note this is my first "complete" game.
